net.jxta.protocol
Class ContentAdvertisement

java.lang.Object
  net.jxta.document.Advertisement
      net.jxta.document.ExtendableAdvertisement
          net.jxta.protocol.ContentAdvertisement
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ContentAdvertisementImpl
public abstract class ContentAdvertisement
extends ExtendableAdvertisement
implements Cloneable

A ContentAdvertisement describes a Content object. Its main purpose is to formally document the existence of a Content instance on the network.

See Also:
Content, ContentID
